name: SUGIMON REX by BOOMBOTIX
description:
TRAFIK and BOOMBOTIX have teamed up to bring you an awesome bluetooth speaker with interchangeable faceplates... the SUGIMON REX! 

L.A. street artist LEEN threw down his SUGIMON character and purple colorway on the 1st faceplate and belt clip combo, while the 2nd faceplate and clip features the TRAFIK logo in minimal Black and White. Switch it up depending on your mood or to match your bike. Bonus, every speaker comes with SUGIMON stickers and TRAFIK bike decals. 

The SUGIMON REX BUMPS!! Music is the center of every party or kick-back and this speaker is always on deck. You never need to buy batteries for it, you can use it as a hands-free for your phone, and it's rugged enough to handle any activity. Best of all, it's bluetooth so your phone or ipod stay safe in your pocket while your riding along, blasting your music.  

This really is the last speaker you will ever need. You can use it with your laptop, tablet, phone, whatever. The party depends on you and your playlist. You better come thru.  

Each SUGIMON REX comes with:
- SUGIMON Faceplate and Belt Clip
- TRAFIK Faceplate and Belt Clip
- Mini stereo cable
- USB charging cable
- TRAFIK bike decals
- SUGIMON cell stickers
- A lot of BASS
- Street cred

<iframe width="215" height="150" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/hOKHMA8qiwI?rel=0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Want more deets on BOOMBOTIX speakers? Check out their site at:
http://www.boombotix.com

name: BURNER BOTTLE 2.0 "SUGIMON ATTACK"
description:
SUGIMON is attacking the city! Hide yo kids! Hide yo bike!

From the mind of LEEN comes this unique new waterbottle design featuring his popular street art character SUGIMON! 

This New Waterbottle is loaded! It comes with a  custom set of #SUGIMON decals to slap up and attack your city, TRAFIK vinyl decals AND our new exclusive 3-button set! SUGIMON ATTACK! 

Get at it before supplies run out

TRAFIK logo and a "Los Angeles" hit in gun-metal grey on the back. Also, the sizing label is screen printed - no itchy tags.

name: TO LIVE & RIDE IN L.A. - Collector's Edition DVD
description: TRAFIK presents the Collector's Edition DVD of To Live & Ride in L.A... From high speed racing on deadly freeways to midnight loft parties, To Live & Ride in L.A. captures underground cycling culture like you've never seen it before. Featuring fixed gear legend Keo Curry (Fast Friday, Macaframa), the film follows a band of L.A.'s most infamous riders as they live fast, ride brakeless, and defy the rules of the road. INCLUDES: • 40 minutes of Bonus Features • Custom box artwork by Swank One • Glossy insert Soundtrack Poster and Photo Sheet • TRAFIK Vinyl decals Pick up the first-run printing of this cult hit. A dope addition to any classic collection. DVD is compatible with international players. BUY IT NOW!

description: The official To Live & Ride in L.A. Logo Tee. Once you get this Tee, you'll wear it all the time. Comfortable, lightweight, stylin'. name: TRAFIK BURNER BAG
description:
<object width="215" height="150"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/pAA-PHG49ms?version=3&hl=en_US"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/TNk1EZc1r_c?version=3&hl=en_US" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="215" height="150" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true"></embed></object>

Fixed gear culture is all about self-expression. Why not wear your creativity on your hip? TRAFIK presents the new Burner Bag. Paint it. Tag it. Bomb it… Do You.

The TRAFIK Burner Bag is a hip pouch/tool bag that was designed to be drawn on, painted, stickered, and sprayed… just about anything works on this bag.  The Burner Bag is made from weatherproof Cordura with a special white vinyl front that is your canvas. It has a ton of interior space for all your essentials, industrial grade velcro closures, a secret pocket for your money, keys, stash, whatever, large (2.5 in) belt loops, plus sewn in 3M reflective strips so cars see you at night. 

This hip bag is made to be used and abused, then used again…Want to change up your artwork? Just buff it out and throw up a new piece. Write a message to the drivers behind you, catch a tag, sticker bomb the sh*t out of it. Make a statement. It's time for you to be the designer... Do You. 

The TRAFIK Burner Bag comes with our TRAFIK Bike Decals + some other stickers we'll throw in to get you started. 

Handmade in L.A. by FAMLI Straps, so you know it's great quality. 

Features:
	•	1,000 denier weatherproof Cordura outer shell and interior
	•	Secure internal pocket with tough Velcro closures
	•	2.5 in. loops designed to accommodate large belts
	•	13oz. white vinyl front - your canvas
	•	3M reflective strips on top and bottom
	•	Nylon 69 thread
        •	TRAFIK sewn in label
     

Dimensions: 8.5” wide, 5.5” high, 3” deep
Volume: 140 cubic in. / 77 Fluid Ounces

<iframe src="http://www.facebook.com/plugins/like.php?href=http://trafikla.bigcartel.com/product/trafik-burner-bottle&layout=standard&show_faces=true&width=450&action=like&colorscheme=dark" scrolling="no" frameborder="0"  allowTransparency="true" style="border:none; overflow:hidden; width:530px; height:60px; color:#fff;"></iframe>

name: The Last Sprint by LEEN
description:
TRAFIK is stoked to present a limited edition art poster by LEEN. "The Last Sprint" is a race
inspired art print featuring his signature SUGIMON character looming over two racers as they battle it out for the finish line. ONLY 30 PRINTED!! and they are all signed and numbered. 

In the velodrome or in a fixed gear crit, racers know that it comes down to The Final Sprint.

These were a hit at Artcrank recently in LA, so head on over to LEEN's web store "LEENISM" and pick one up before they're all gone. 

http://leenism.bigcartel.com/
http://leenism.bigcartel.com/
http://leenism.bigcartel.com/
http://leenism.bigcartel.com/

Poster Deets
*18x24 - BIG
*Black ink Screenprint with yellow eye accent
*Looks amazing in your room, office, art studio, man cave, RV or trap house
*80lb stock natural white paper
*Comes with SUGIMON stickers
*Hand drawn and printed in L.A. 
*Limited edition, while supplies last

name: TRUE RIDERS SOCIETY - LIMITED EDITION
description: Fixed Gear Culture is a global brotherhood of True Riders. This limited edition tee is dedicated to the riders who have left it all on the streets, doing what they love. We Ride Together We Die Together NO RIDER LEFT BEHIND This is Global Fixed Gear Culture TRAFIK has teamed up with YEAH! to create a limited edition product that is beyond dope. The TRUE RIDERS SOCIETY Tee is the highest of quality and comes with tons of limited extras. This is a true collectors item, you're not even gonna want to throw out the envelope it arrives in. Get yours now before they are all gone! Each Limited Edition package contains: • High Quality Cotton Tee with custom artwork by Boncu on the front & back + secret black hits on the sleeves and a silk-screened sizing label - no itchy tags • Sewn on woven TRAFIK hem label and woven YEAH! seam label • Custom Natural Suede Print • LIMITED EDITION STICKERS: -TRAFIK x YEAH! Reflective Vinyl sticker -Skull & Helmet vinyl sticker -TRAFIK bike decals (2) • Custom True Riders Society hangtag & chain • Custom printed TRUE RIDERS SOCIETY collectors envelope **If you order 2 or more Tee's we'll send you a YEAH! Canvas Tote bag as a free gift! (while supplies last) and a YEAH! sticker pack too! Hook up! See what people are saying about this worldwide collaboration... Create Folly Review #TRUERIDERS

name: PIAS Track Frameset - Black & Gold
description: *All frame-sets come complete with a fork and Tange headset from Japan.* TRAFIK x Sumvelo have combined forces to present the PIAS for the first time in the USA! PIAS is an aggressive, NJS inspired track frame that is at home on the velodrome or in the city streets. It's available exclusively through TRAFIK. Forged from the strongest and lightest steel available, 4130 Chromoly, PIAS only weighs 5 lbs out of the box, but can take a beating on the worst city streets. A fork rake of 35mm means little toe overlap and tight cornering at high speeds. The slightly pursuit geometry keeps your momentum moving forward and allows for a more aero body position. The quality of the workmanship on this bike is amazing: laser cut track ends are clean and precise, TIG welding is the best there is, the fork lugs are detailed and sharp, and the paint job is ill. But best of all, this baby is FAST! PIAS do not come drilled for brakes. But they can be added. Here are the stats: • 4130 Chromoly steel – used in airplanes, Steel is Real • Laser-Cut Track Ends – for extreme precision • Aggressive Geometry – Slightly pursuit position • 35mm Fork Rake – Little or no pedal strike. Take corners like a champ! • TIG Welding – The best welding process available. The quality of the work is amazing on this frame. • Tange Headset – a quality Japanese headset comes with every frame sold. • NJS inspired style – Inspired by the famous NJS bikes of Japanese Keirin racers but at a much lower cost. • COLORS: Black w/ Gold Flake & Brushed Steel. Tech Specs: • Bottom Bracket: English Threaded • Rear Spacing: 120mm Track End • Fork: 1” threaded; fork and Tange Headset included • Seatpost: 27.2mm; bolt clamp • Small= 50cm • Medium= 53cm • Large = 55cm -FREE SHIPPING- Anywhere in the USA! * International orders may be charged a customs duty depending on country - this is the buyer's responsibility* All PIAS framesets come with TRAFIK's signature reflective black vinyl decal.
